original_text: The king of Babylon hath heard the report of them, and his hands waxed feeble: anguish took hold of him, and pangs as of a woman in travail.
korean_text: 바벨론의 왕이 그 소문을 듣고 손이 약하여지며 고통에 사로잡혀 해산하는 여인처럼 진통하는도다

sentences.original_text: The king of Babylon hath heard the report of them,
and pangs as of a woman in travail.
sentences.korean_translation: 해산하는 여인의 산통 같은 고통이 닥쳤다.
